Mars iron core cooled unevenly, causing it to rotate with the surface. That caused it to lose it's magnetosphere, or magnetic shield from the Sun's radiation. Over millions of years, the solar wind blew away the vast majority of Mars atmosphere. All the talk of 'teraforming' ignores this fact, even if you create atmosphere on Mars, it mostly just blows away. So the only realistic way to colonize mars will be mostly underground.
